de.ailis.usb4java.libusb

Interface PollfdListener


  • public interface PollfdListener
    Listener interface for pollfd notifications.
    Author:
    Klaus Reimer (k@ailis.de)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void pollfdAdded(FileDescriptor fd, int events, Object userData)
      Callback function, invoked when a new file descriptor should be added to the set of file descriptors monitored for events.
      void pollfdRemoved(FileDescriptor fd, Object userData)
      Callback function, invoked when a file descriptor should be removed from the set of file descriptors being monitored for events.

    • Method Detail

      • pollfdAdded

        void pollfdAdded(FileDescriptor fd,
               int events,
               Object userData)
        Callback function, invoked when a new file descriptor should be added to the set of file descriptors monitored for events.
        Parameters:
        fd - the new file descriptor.
        events - events to monitor for.
        userData - User data pointer.

      • pollfdRemoved

        void pollfdRemoved(FileDescriptor fd,
                 Object userData)
        Callback function, invoked when a file descriptor should be removed from the set of file descriptors being monitored for events. After returning from this callback, do not use that file descriptor again.
        Parameters:
        fd - The file descriptor to stop monitoring.
        userData - User data pointer.
